summary: This module defines a set of unit tests that validate the behavior of the Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD) metric implementation, checking error handling for incompatible input shapes, correct processing of singleâ€‘sample inputs, and verification of computed metric values against expected results.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the MMD metric used in medical imaging workflows, providing confidence that statistical discrepancy calculations are reliable for research and clinical applications.
